post.author: 김태희
post.content:
Title: Opening for Sr. Programmer in US
Posted On: 2/22/2010 10:13:57 AM
Designation: Sr. Programmer
Number of Vacancies: 2
Qualifications: Bachelor Degree
Essential Skills:
.NET 2.0 - 3 yrs.
C# - 3 yrs.
MS SQL Server - 2 yrs.
Minimum Experience: 5 yrs.
Job Tenure: No Preference/Any
Salary Offered: Not specified
Job Location: Toronto, ON, Canada
Job Description
Full Description :-

* Senior programmer in .NET 2.0 language C# web applications
* Familiar with master pages; good understanding of MS SQL Server, Stored procedures and ANSI SQL
* Understands requirement gathering; code using Ajax
* Familiarity with web interface layouts and experience with Visual Source safe.
* Minimum 5 years experience in programming with some college.

-- Must be a US Citizen.


If you meet the above skill sets, kindly apply online.

Pass on to your friends too and check out www.iitjobs.com

# This position is for El Segundo, CA, United States.

Company Details
Name: Emenu Inc.
Type: Consulting Organization
Total Employees: Not specified
Turnover: Not specified
Address:
PO Box 685,
Wayzata,
Minnesota,
United States
post.title: Opening for Sr. Programmer in US
